title.narrative: Voluntary medical program to combat blindness and its causes in Pakistan

description.narrative: - Medical examinations were conducted for 4,000 beneficiaries - 400 surgeries were performed to remove cataracts from the eyes and correct vision 400 eyeglasses were distributed

2. Eliminate the suffering of many blind people 3. Health education for everyone receiving treatment 4. Providing patients' needs for medicines, glasses and lenses 5. Subsidy from the Ministry of Health of the host country

This campaign comes within a voluntary medical campaigns by KSRELIEF to combat blindness and the diseases that cause it, which are funded and implemented by the center in many countries around the world
